title: Gotham
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034946/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034946/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Gotham**

Gotham was designed by [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034946/http:/typophile.com/wiki/tobias%20frere-jones) as an homage to the vernacular typography found in and around New York City. [Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034946/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hoefler%20%2526%20Frere-Jones) released the family commercially in 2003.

**External Links**  
 [Gotham at H&FJ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034946/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/index.html)
author: Joe Pemberton
